title: Vasundhara Pushpa Jhumkas: Ruby, Emerald & Polki Floral Drop Earrings
features: Exquisite floral design inspired by South Indian temple art. Features a central cluster of natural rubies surrounded by emerald cabochons and polki diamonds in an uncut style. Delicate ruby drops cascade from the polki diamond setting. The gold framework showcases the intricate detailing of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
occasions: and formal events. Ideal for muhurtham
or a half-saree function. Suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern ethnic wear.
description: A stunning blend of traditional Telugu jewelry design and modern elegance. The use of natural, high-quality gemstones ensures enduring value. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and gives the piece an antique appeal. The floral motif represents prosperity and beauty, making it a meaningful and treasured possession.
